archiefmat.scope: Registers of outgoing correspondence contain the the short contents of letters sent to the Ministry of Colonies and to authorities in Suriname The the addressee, date and number of the letter are listed as well the numbers in the journal and in the protocol of resolutions (?)
archiefmat.notes:
Years: January 1858 - December 1868; July 1869 - December 1872.

The complete series up to 1911 consists of 58 volumes.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
